title: KaizenJujustsu
author: KaizenJujustsu
content: I am just curious about how does online casino pay for their promotion on their influencers? Where does their earning comes from? How will you get scammed when you try online casino? How can you tell that online casino is safe?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PMWhere does their earning comes from? Where casino earning come from? From people that are using the casino. Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PMHow will you get scammed when you try online casino? There are fake casinos. You need to make findings if a casino is legit or not.Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PMHow can you tell that online casino is safe?You can check how old the casino is, and also check some reviewing sites, browse online about the casinonif legit or not. You can always come to this forum and ask about any casino, if trustworthy or not.

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PMI am just curious about how does online casino pay for their promotion on their influencers?Using the house edge profit. Casino always have a guarantee profit from house edge as long as they will have an active players in the casino.Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PM How will you get scammed when you try online casino? You will only get scammed if you play on shady casino. Play only on reputable casino, follow the rules and don’t leave your balance on your casino wallet.Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PM How can you tell that online casino is safe?Simple, Do your own research, Use Bitcointalk forum to search the casino Announcement thread then browse on the reputation and feedbacks. You can use trusted gambling review site like BTCGOSU to refer on trusted casino because they always give a fair and honest review.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PMI am just curious about how does online casino pay for their promotion on their influencers?There are many types of deals to choose from. Casino owners usually have start up capital to fund for their advertising. They can also take profits from operation to pay. There's also the option to pay in referrals or a special percentage in affiliates. QuoteWhere does their earning comes from?From the losing players of course. Where else? QuoteHow will you get scammed when you try online casino?There's no 100% solution to this as they can shutdown the site and run away with the funds anytime. You just have to be extra careful in choosing which platform to gamble your money. Some of the basics to look for is their reputation. How long have they been operating? Check reviews from reliable gambling forums or sites. QuoteHow can you tell that online casino is safe?Same reasoning as above but I'd also like to add the following:- RNG Certified- Provably fair- Maybe license as well

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Casino owners most probably have a budget to pay for the marketing out of their pocket. It seems necessary to market the casino. I just don't know how they make the deal with the influencer. If the casino doesn't want to risks then they must have something like a reward for achieving something. Could it be how much the influencers bring to the casino since the start of his promotion?

comments.author: Shamm
comments.body: Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PMI am just curious about how does online casino pay for their promotion on their influencers? Actually before they create a casino they have already the plan and have a budget for thier promotion.They can pay for thier promotions it's because they have enough or extra money from their casino and also to have many player in thier casino they need to have a promotion..QuoteWhere does their earning comes from? From the gamblers who came in the casino loss. And it's obvious that once they build a casino they alresdy know the outcome.QuoteHow will you get scammed when you try online casino?  you will get scammed if you are greedy to play in a casino without searching all the details of that casino.QuoteHow can you tell that online casino is safe? base in their review or feed back from other gamblers who have experienced of that casino or else you can try to deposit a small amount and play then after a few try and you feel that casino has now issue in withdrawal then you can try big deposits .

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PM1I am just curious about how does online casino pay for their promotion on their influencers? 2Where does their earning comes from? 3How will you get scammed when you try online casino? 4How can you tell that online casino is safe?1 Casino is a business, a business need a budget for marketing or other things which is prepared even before they started the business. So simple answer is they pay influencers from their own wallet.  Of course there are also some casino that do not have enough budget for big marketing and they can wait until they gain enough profit first before starting the promotion/brand ambassadors. 2 Are you sure to ask about it? 3 If you do not careful in choosing which casinos are reliable enough to play. 4 By my own experience as well as by reading a review (the valid ones).

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Whenever some person or company starts a casino online or in a physical location, they hire personnel and calculate a budget so they can cover the initial investment.It is like any other kind of business. If you want to open a restaurant, you need to buy raw food, pay cooks, buy machines and ovens. Sometime must pass by, before they see some profit.The advertisement part also is a percentage of that initial budget, by the way. When comes to security, I would say that in order for one to be safe, just to stick to casinos which have a good track record, are provably fair and are properly registered in their jurisdiction. If you ever feel like trying a small and relatively unknown casino, do so with small deposits.

comments.author: Ryu_Ar1
comments.body: I think when I say everything it is clear that there are a lot of risks but when I say about the problem of fraud or whatever it is that is detrimental indeed it must exist it's just possible for casinos that are not very well highlighted and of course we can avoid that if we check earlier before being there. I think when you are on bitcointalk there are already some recommendations for online casinos so why look for something new just to try gambling. Even though it's good to try some new things, but when the risk is much bigger, I prefer to use something that has been proven in terms of reputation, rather than trying new things that are not yet clear.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Not only online casinos but gambling in general, risk is present. There's no certainty with winning which makes it a risky investment. Both online and land based casino has risk. Landbased casinos would expose a gambler to trouble, vices in particular with second hand smoke. While in online gambling, players are prone to hacking and non paying gambling sites. But both would be risky of losing for sure because that is a part of gambling or what makes gambling, "gambling". Quote from: bittraffic on March 31, 2023, 02:34:03 PMCasino owners most probably have a budget to pay for the marketing out of their pocket. It seems necessary to market the casino. I just don't know how they make the deal with the influencer. If the casino doesn't want to risks then they must have something like a reward for achieving something. Could it be how much the influencers bring to the casino since the start of his promotion?For sure they have, and they should. Given how many gambling platforms are there, existing. Therefore a new platform should have something to market themselves to potential players in order to attract future investors or players which would give life to the site itself.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PMI am just curious about how does online casino pay for their promotion on their influencers? Where does their earning comes from? Most online casinos pay their influencers through commissions based on the number of people who sign up and deposit money using the influencer's referral link. As for their earnings, I believe they come from the money that players lose when they gamble on their platform.Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PMHow will you get scammed when you try online casino? How can you tell that online casino is safe?It's important to do your research and choose a reputable online casino. Look for licenses and certifications, as well as reviews from other players. Another thing to watch out for is bonuses that seem too good to be true. Some online casinos offer huge bonuses, but they come with impossible wagering requirements or other hidden terms and conditions that make it nearly impossible to actually cash out any winnings.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Quote from: Yatsan on March 31, 2023, 02:56:02 PMNot only online casinos but gambling in general, risk is present. There's no certainty with winning which makes it a risky investment. Both online and land based casino has risk. Landbased casinos would expose a gambler to trouble, vices in particular with second hand smoke. While in online gambling, players are prone to hacking and non paying gambling sites. But both would be risky of losing for sure because that is a part of gambling or what makes gambling, "gambling". Quote from: bittraffic on March 31, 2023, 02:34:03 PMCasino owners most probably have a budget to pay for the marketing out of their pocket. It seems necessary to market the casino. I just don't know how they make the deal with the influencer. If the casino doesn't want to risks then they must have something like a reward for achieving something. Could it be how much the influencers bring to the casino since the start of his promotion?For sure they have, and they should. Given how many gambling platforms are there, existing. Therefore a new platform should have something to market themselves to potential players in order to attract future investors or players which would give life to the site itself.What I'm thinking is that the casino will reward the influencer after every milestone is achieved. The influencer may not receive his pay until he achieves a milestone. Probably after 500 sign-ups under his referral and then he gets paid. Most of them will promote thier affiliate link all the time in the description. I was planning to be an influencer, I just don't have more followers yet on my crypto youtube channel. I wonder if I should be making contacts to casinos myself after all I already have 800+ subscribers. I wanna strike a deal actually, to see if I could get paid.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PMI am just curious about how does online casino pay for their promotion on their influencers? Where does their earning comes from? How will you get scammed when you try online casino? How can you tell that online casino is safe?To ask these things just means that you do not know anything about casinos and how they operate, casino operation offline and online is profitable, they get their profit from people using their platform the house edge beat these people so they will able to pay their influencers, you get scammed by scam casinos reputable casinos will never scam you as long as you read and follow their rules, and a casino is safe if they have a name in the industry and they have proven their worth over the years.

comments.author: tusandii
comments.body: Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PMI am just curious about how does online casino pay for their promotion on their influencers? Casinos hire influencers with the aim of getting lots of customers and being able to get as much profit as possible from customers and it is this advantage that casinos use to pay their influencers.QuoteWhere does their earning comes from? The casino has income from customers who play and lose. Even casinos can pay out wins from other customers who win, only spending a little money from the income that has been earned.QuoteHow will you get scammed when you try online casino? As long as we play at an established casino that has a good reputation and has a high level of trust, it is impossible for us to be deceived by a casino.QuoteHow can you tell that online casino is safe?Choosing a casino there are several aspects that must be prioritized such as licenses, reputation, service, customer reviews and seeing how much they are trusted by gamblers.If all of these aspects exist in the casino then you can be sure it is safe to use.

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PMI am just curious about how does online casino pay for their promotion on their influencers? Where does their earning comes from? How will you get scammed when you try online casino? How can you tell that online casino is safe?If you are talking about the source of income of an online casino, I think you are not much familiar with this. In this forum, the most significant portion of projects that are promoting themself through signature campaigns are online casinos. And most of them are also the highest-paying projects. btw the what already said the basic income comes from the house edge. But they earn more than it is from player losses. and you have to find a safe casino that is much popular, pays their customers, and runs for a long time.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PMI am just curious about how does online casino pay for their promotion on their influencers? Where does their earning comes from? How will you get scammed when you try online casino? How can you tell that online casino is safe?Casinos are business entities honestly I'm surprised to see this kind of question as if you don't know and have not seen an online casino, it's almost the same as an offline casino, casinos are entertainment portals where people are betting on luck-based games, and since the casino has the edge it always wins.The casino is safe if players are giving testimonials on its reputation, there are no open scam accusations and they always resolve all issues, but honestly, your money is not safe in online casinos, if you don't know how to control yourself from gambling.

comments.author: goldkingcoiner
comments.body: Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PMI am just curious about how does online casino pay for their promotion on their influencers? Where does their earning comes from? How will you get scammed when you try online casino? How can you tell that online casino is safe?Obviously the promotions are funded by the casino's own turnover, which is mainly an income stream from the gamblers playing on their online casino website. Of course they lose some money by doing bonuses and promotion but what kind of business does not spend money on advertising? And this kind of advertising that they do is compared to other types of advertisement actually very cheap! Because they make back most of the promotion money from the gamblers they gave it to. And its featured on their own website so they can decide the rules of that promotion.

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PMI am just curious about how does online casino pay for their promotion on their influencers? Where does their earning comes from? How will you get scammed when you try online casino? How can you tell that online casino is safe?1. Reputable casinos always pay their influencers. As you can see in this forum many casinos do their promotion through signature camp and they spend thousands of dollars every week on promotion.2. Casino sites receive a commission from every bet placed by gamblers.  And in games like blackjack, they are dealers, from here there is an earning and also has loss, but all in all, the casino sites earn a huge amount.3. When you choose a reputable casino site, make sure it is safe.  But it may not save you when you go to gamble on a new site.  So it matters what kind of site you are going to gamble on

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on March 31, 2023, 02:12:32 PMI am just curious about how does online casino pay for their promotion on their influencers? Where does their earning comes from? How will you get scammed when you try online casino? How can you tell that online casino is safe?Online casino always takes risk because it’s gambling. By simply depositing in any casino regardless of reputation will already put you on risk of losing money because you gambling your money for a chance to win.Casino generates profit from the players money that lose in their games. Casino always win due to their games design for their advantage. They have huge funds for marketing and this is the money being use to paid influencers and other marketing campaign of the casino. As for other question. You should always do background check before you play in any casino. Choose the most used casino to make sure you are safe.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: your question should be well structured to make it look neater, I will summarize it here the casino will pay for all influencer campaign promotions from their income at the casino for example from the money of gamblers who lose there and that is also their source of income, usually new casinos will be more prone to be fraudulent casino so better see the reputation of the casino or wait for positive feedback on the casino especially active in this forum so we can also know that this casino is really safe.
